channel.title: Ess Runner What a cash maker
channel.description:
Howdy :)
I am not sure on how aware you guys are with "ess running" but it happens in world 16 for airs and 66 for laws, as far as i know. The idea is you trade a crafter 25 unnoted essence and they trade u (runes, or money) 2500g and 25 NOTED ESS back so you lose nothing! but time :mad:.
Now to script somthing to suscessfully auto run ess would be hard but with the right "anti ban " features it would be briliant. I myslelf am not capable of scripting this. :confused:
But on the other hand runners are in and out of temple and there is realy no need for player on player chat.
I wonder why no ne has thought of this before? Maybe you guy are not aware of it, check out world 16 fallador air temple it will blow your mind how busy it gets sometime with only 2 crafters and 50 runners.
Just a idea. :D Blackhat

“ess running”

item.title: Ess Runner What a cash maker
item.dc:creator: @blackhat blackhat
item.description:
@blackhat wrote:

[quote=“Starblaster100, post:6, topic:904”]Made an air crafter and a law runner - worked great last time i tested them
They just need updating really,[/quote]

Couyld u psot them anyway so i can have a look. Thanks mate,

B.T.W guys: crafters normaly were black for air and red for law and like shadow synax said The Word open is wat we need scar to look out for.

Ill keep you updated on how its coming just pm me if you wanna help and have ideas or post them here in this thread.

Cheers,
Blackhat

Read full topic

item.title: Ess Runner What a cash maker
item.dc:creator: @ShadowSyntax ShadowSyntax
item.description:
@ShadowSyntax wrote:

Some of them. Others just say ‘Open’.

The best idea would be to get SCAR to search for the word ‘Open’ then store to memory the person who said it and his position on the minimap, then search for the same person every time after until he dissapears.

Read full topic
